ShowNotSeenCardsWhilePicking.title: Show new cards
ShowNotSeenCardsWhilePicking.description: Displays hints about cards you have not seen before.

ShowNotTakenCardsWhilePicking.title: Show not taken cards
ShowNotTakenCardsWhilePicking.description: Display hints about cards you have seen but not have picked before.

CardHintsDisplayStyleWhilePicking.title: Card hints display style
CardHintsDisplayStyleWhilePicking.description: The style to use for displaying the new/seen hints.

ShowSeenButNotTakenCardsInCodex.title: Show seen cards in the Codex
ShowSeenButNotTakenCardsInCodex.description: Show cards you have seen but not taken yet in the Codex.

NotSeen.title: New Card!
NotSeen.description: You have not seen this card before.

Seen.title: Seen Card
Seen.description: You have seen but not taken this card before.

Taken.title: Taken Card
Taken.description: You have taken this card before.

ShowNotSeenArtifactsWhilePicking.title: Show new artifacts
ShowNotSeenArtifactsWhilePicking.description: Displays hints about artifacts you have not seen before.

ShowNotTakenArtifactsWhilePicking.title: Show not taken artifacts
ShowNotTakenArtifactsWhilePicking.description: Display hints about artifacts you have seen but not have picked before.

ArtifactHintsDisplayStyleWhilePicking.title: Artifact hints display style
ArtifactHintsDisplayStyleWhilePicking.description: The style to use for displaying the new/seen hints.

ShowSeenButNotTakenArtifactsInCodex.title: Show seen artifacts in the Codex
ShowSeenButNotTakenArtifactsInCodex.description: Show artifacts you have seen but not taken yet in the Codex.

NotSeen.title: New Artifact!
NotSeen.description: You have not seen this artifact before.

Seen.title: Seen Artifact
Seen.description: You have seen but not taken this artifact before.

Taken.title: Taken Artifact
Taken.description: You have taken this artifact before.

description.specificCrew: You've beaten this difficulty with this crew.
